lead_paragraph: Indian officials said diplomatic meeting will rescheduled and called Pakistan’s arrest of members of a militant group an “important and positive" step.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Pakistan Talks Rescheduled
headline.main: India, Praising Arrest of Militants, to Restart Talks with Pakistan

snippet: Indian officials said diplomatic meeting will rescheduled and called Pakistan’s arrest of members of a militant group an “important and positive" step.
abstract: Indian diplomats say they will reschedule talks with Pakistan, after Pakistani authorities arrested Jaish-e-Muhammad militants suspected of attacking Indian Air Force base.
